GSD.description:
drm/amd/pm: fix double free in si_parse_power_table()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit 6c5bdaa1325be7f04b79ea992ab216739192d342. For more details please see the references link.
